response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $10,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire this high-quality item at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 10000}
